mapper.update: UPDATE Menu SET menu_score = ( CASE WHEN like_count + dislike_count = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ( ( (like_count + 1.9208) / (like_count + dislike_count) - 1.96 * SQRT( (like_count * dislike_count) / (like_count + dislike_count) + 0.9604 ) / (like_count + dislike_count) ) / (1 + 3.8416 / (like_count + dislike_count)) ) END )
